Welcome to Topics and Summary’s documentation!¶

Date: May 06, 2019 Version: 1.0

Useful links: Source Repository | PowerPoint presentation | Contact the author

topics_and_summary is a library that identifies topics in a collection of text documents and classifies the documents inside that topics. It also generates summaries of text documents. This is done using NLP techniques.

See the Introduction for more detail about the objectives and functionalities of the library.
